means: 使变形，使变质，把…变成…( transmute的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Scientists transmuted matter into pure energy and exploded the first atomic bomb.
sentence.Network_cn: 科学家将物质转化为纯粹的能量，引爆了第一颗原子弹。

sentence.Network_en: It was once thought that lead could be transmuted into gold.
sentence.Network_cn: 有人曾经认为铅可以变成黄金。

sentence.Network_en: They transmuted the raw materials into finished products.

PerfectNetExp.abs: transmuted 使变化的, transmuted 蜕变的, transmuted 使变性的
transmute 形变, transmuted 使变性的, transmuted 使变化的

list.abs: 核能专业词汇英语翻译... ... nuclear transition 核跃迁 nuclear transmutation 核转变 nuclear transparency 核穿透性.
1. 热核战争thermonuclear transmutation 热核转化thermonuclear weapon 热核武器
transmitting tube 发射管transmutation doping 质变掺杂transparency 透萌
transmutation of measures 量数转换transmuted score 转换分数transparency 透明度

entry.def: If something transmutes or is transmuted into a different form, it is changed into that form.

example.ex: She ceased to think, as anger transmuted into passion...
example.tran: 当怒火转化为激情，她停止了思考。

example.ex: Scientists transmuted matter into pure energy and exploded the first atomic bomb.
example.tran: 科学家将物质转化为纯粹的能量，引爆了第一颗原子弹。

auth_sentence.content: Seventy, when tragedy is transmuted into kitsch?
auth_sentence.res_content: Seventy, when tragedy is transmuted into kitsch?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Seventy, when tragedy is transmuted into kitsch?

auth_sentence.content: The slim, smiling bride...was now transmuted into a plump, faded woman.
auth_sentence.res_content: The slim, smiling bride...was now transmuted into a plump, faded woman.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The slim, smiling bride...was now transmuted into a plump, faded woman.

auth_sentence.content: Some source imply that much of our nuclear waste can be transmuted into useful resources.
auth_sentence.res_content: Some source imply that much of our nuclear waste can be transmuted into useful resources.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Some source imply that much of our nuclear waste can be transmuted into useful resources.
